channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: When Chasing More Dividends Leaves You With Less
item.description: High-yield equity funds are popular, but the pursuit of a large payout can sink your portfolio.

item.title: Why Broadcom stock is tumbling after an earnings beat — and how to play the dip
item.description: The investment thesis for Broadcom is intact: AI revenues are strong, non-AI semi sales are bottoming and the VMWare integration is exceeding all expe...

item.title: Morgan Stanley Is Fined Over First Republic Insider Sales
item.description: Massachusetts securities regulator found several breakdowns in the bank’s approval and monitoring of possible insider trading.

item.title: Broadcom says it will sell $12 billion in AI parts and custom chips this year
item.description: Broadcom CEO Hock Tan said in a statement that the company expects to record $12 billion in sales from AI parts and custom chips in fiscal 2024.

item.title: Why Now May Be the Time to Invest in Small-Cap Stocks
item.description: Lower interest rates and a stabilizing economy could fuel a rally in smaller companies after years of lagging performance.

item.title: Volvo Cars cuts margin and revenue aims after ditching 2030 electric vehicle target
item.description: The Swedish automaker is trimming its earnings margin goal for 2026 due to "increased complexity especially in relation to global trade and tariffs."

item.title: Pandemic Darling Moderna Needs a Reality Check
item.description: Moderna is spending aggressively to broaden the uses of its mRNA technology. Investors are losing patience.

item.title: Dollar Tree shares plunge 22% after discounter cuts full-year forecast
item.description: Dollar stores, in particular, have felt pinched as their core customer makes trade-offs after a prolonged period of pricier food and everyday costs.

item.title: How Nvidia Became the Market's Most Important Stock, in Charts
item.description: The graphics chipmaker lost nearly $280 billion in market value Tuesday, the most ever by a company in a single session.

item.title: Dick's Sporting Goods blows past earnings estimates but issues cautious guidance ahead of 2024 election
item.description: Theft at Dick's Sporting Goods had previously impacted its profits but the company now appears to be past those issues.
